title: Banda de Além
body: In this place, in the parish of Madalena do Mar, there existed and still exist the ruins of an ancient chapel dedicated to Santa Quiteria, founded by Father Diogo de Freitas Faria, in a year that is unknown.

Madalena do Mar: Location of the ruins of an ancient chapel dedicated to Santa Quiteria, founded by Father Diogo de Freitas Faria
